author: gstein

(svn_wc__db_temp_reset_format): take a new format value. leave behind a
comment on why this isn't ideal, but maybe required.
may need to modify the baton, which could throw errors, and we need a
(adm_access_alloc, do_open): no need to initialize WC_FORMAT

(svn_wc_adm_probe_open3): don't worry about the format value

author: hwright
msg: Use svn_dirent_* functions in place of svn_path_* functions.

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Note the need for a backport branch on r36851 and friends; add a -0

author: gstein
msg: Get the wcprops out of the access baton.
Note: this could slow checkout since we rewrite all_wcprops each time a
modification is made (it used to aggregate writes).
Note: working copies from svn 1.3 and earlier, that contain stale logs
with wcprop modifications can no longer be cleaned up by this release.
(read_wcprops): always read the wcprops off the disk and return them,
rather than caching them in the baton. switch to two-pool style.
(write_wcprops): take the all_wcprops to write, rather than grabbing
them out of the baton. slight clarification to any_props code.
(svn_wc__wcprops_flush): removed. no further callers (last was in log.c)
(wcprops_modify_allowed): new helper function to bail out if we attempt
to write wcprops for an old working copy format.
(svn_wc__props_delete): only allow wcprops deletion in new-style working
copies. get the wcprops using read_wcprops rather than the cache.
revamp the prophash handling before write.
(svn_wc__wcprop_list): ignore the cache, and always read the props into
(svn_wc__wcprop_set): remove FORCE_WRITE parameter. bail if the wc
format is too old. revamp the read/write logic.
(svn_wc_prop_set3): drop FORCE_WRITE parameter on wcprop_set call.
svn_wc__wcprop_set call. no need to set WCPROPS_MODIFIED.
(run_log_from_memory): no need to initialize old WCPROPS_MODIFIED
(run_log): no need to initialize old WCPROPS_MODIFIED member. no need to
